statements: UPDATE influencer_recommendations SET followers_count = 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE influencer_recommendations SET engagement_rate = 2.5, campaign_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE influencer_recommendations SET engagement_rate = 5.75, followers_count = 50000 WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe' AND campaign_name = 'Summer Sale';
UPDATE influencer_recommendations SET followers_count = 75000, engagement_rate = 8.2 WHERE id = 101
UPDATE influencers SET followers = 15000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_data SET end_date = '2022-12-31', start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE campaign_id = 100;
UPDATE influencers SET followers = followers + 100, engagement_rate = 5.7 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_data SET start_date = '2023-01-01', end_date = '2023-06-30' WHERE influencer_id = 4 AND campaign_name = 'Summer Sale';
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = 5000 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE CampaignPerformance SET clicks = 100, revenue = 1500.00 WHERE performance_id = 3;
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = followers_count + 1000 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE CampaignPerformance SET clicks = clicks * 2, conversions = conversions + 10 WHERE campaign_id = 5;
UPDATE campaigns SET start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE influencers SET followers_count = 50000, category = 'Fashion' WHERE influencer_id = 3;

UPDATE campaign_influencers SET engagement_rate = 0.75 WHERE campaign_id = 5 AND influencer_id = 3;
